title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: Self driving cars with autopilot to help with car steering, acceleration, and braking for other vehicles and pedestrains within its lane.
tuit: Autopilot is an advanced driver assistance system that assist your car with steering, accelerating, and braking for other vehicles and pedestrains within its lanes. It assists with the most burdensome parts of driving.
